nodes.text: The Churba sector was a sector located in the Mid Rim. Planets in the sector included Lelmra, Storthus, New Cov, and Churba itself. The Peregrine's Nest's final location was also in this sector.
Imperial Intelligence agent Kirtan Loor hailed from the planet Churba.
Following the Battle of Endor, the Churba sector was among the first sectors to throw off the Empire.

Star Wars: Rebellion incorrectly places Tokmia, Allyuen, Anoat, Deyer, Gentes, Bespin, and Hoth in the Churba sector rather than the Anoat sector. Rebellion also mistakenly places the Churba sector in the Outer Rim.
